channel.title: Command Help

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @TehhJess TehhJess
item.description:
@TehhJess wrote:

Okay well the giveadmin,mod,donor,demote etcc is only meant to be me, but my friend owns the server with me, butim not sure how to make it be me & him, everytime i try it fails, well here it is

} if(cmd[0].equals("givemod") && (player.getUsername().equals("jess"))) { Player other = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1)))); other.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have been promoted to an Pk Perfect [562] MODERATOR!!"); if (other != null) { other.rights = 1;

Read full topic
